description: Active labour market measures targeting the socially excluded developed and implemented.

subproject.corporate outcome: Policies, strategies and partnerships established to enhance public-private sector collaboration and private sector and market development that benefit the poor and ensure that low-income households and small enterprises have access to a broad range of financial and legal services
subproject.description: The project aims at development of the partnership with state/governmental bodies and agencies. In particular, it will closely collaborate with Ministry of Labour and Social Policy, Employment Service Agency, Agency for Promotion of Entrepreneurship, and Central Register in development and implementation of Active Labour Market Measures: Self-employment and Formalization of existing business. The project will support the Ministry of Education and Science and Vocational Education and Training Centre in improving the arrangements for delivery of short-term training programmes. The project will strengthen capacities of the Employment Service Agency to develop Monitoring & Evaluation strategy for all active labour market measures defined with Employment Operational Plan 2009 and to make impact assessment of self-employment measure implemented in 2007 and 2008.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Self-employment III

subproject.corporate outcome: Policies, strategies and partnerships established to enhance public-private sector collaboration and private sector and market development that benefit the poor and ensure that low-income households and small enterprises have access to a broad range of financial and legal services
subproject.description: The project aims at development of the partnership with state/governmental bodies and agencies. In particular, it will closely collaborate with Ministry of Labour and Social Policy, Employment Service Agency, Agency for Promotion of Entrepreneurship, and Central Register in development and implementation of Active Labour Market Measures: Self-employment and Formalization of existing business. The project will support the Ministry of Education and Science and Vocational Education and Training Centre in improving the arrangements for short-term training programmes. Moreover, UNDP will provide assistance in piloting a measure for supporting the growth of the firms established with 2007 and 2008 employment  programme.

subproject.title: Self-employment IV

subproject.corporate outcome: Policies, strategies and partnerships established to enhance public-private sector collaboration and private sector and market development that benefit the poor and ensure that low-income households and small enterprises have access to a broad range of financial and legal services
subproject.description: The project shall support the Ministry of Labour and Social Policy, Employment Service Agency, Agency for Promotion of Entrepreneurship, and Central Register in development and implementation of Active Labour Market Measures: Self-employment, Formalization of existing business and Additional employment in previously registered companies. It will also support the Ministry of Education and Science and Vocational Education and Training Centre in improving the arrangements for provision of certified  short-term training. the Programme will also support piloting of  the Labour mobility measure, as well as implementation of the Roma Employment Support activities, part of the Roma Decade action plan.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Self-employment V

title: Self-employment Programme
